fr.This device seems to be offline. The Zen: Cet appareil semble être déconnecté. Le serveur ZenyPass n’est pas joignable. Vérifiez votre connexion et essayez à nouveau.
fr.Sorry, something went wrong: Désolé, il y a eu un problème
fr.You have reached the website storage lim: Vous avez atteint la limite de stockage de sites de votre compte ZenyPass: vous pouvez acheter plus d'espace de stockage depuis le menu 'stockage'.

en.This device seems to be offline. The Zen: This device seems to be offline. The ZenyPass server cannot be reached. Please check your connection and try again.
en.You have reached the website storage lim: You have reached the website storage limit of your ZenyPass account: you can purchase additional storage from the 'storage' menu.
